name: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters password less than 6 characters

children.description: Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I enter "a" less than six characters on the Login form
And I enter "jenny32@yopmail.com" on Login form
And I click the 'Đăng nhập' button
Then The error message is shown "Mật khẩu phải trên 6 ký tự"on the Login form

userStory.narrative: I want to login to the system

title: Verify that the error message is shown when user enters password less than 6 characters

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I am on the Home page and click the User icon
When I enter "<Password>" less than six characters on the Login form
And I enter "<Email>" on Login form
And I click the 'Đăng nhập' button
Then The error message is shown "Mật khẩu phải trên 6 ký tự"on the Login form
